item.description:
From the traffic light in between the Merrimack Public Library and the Mobil Station turn onto Baboosic Lake Rd from the D W Highway/ US Rte. 3 and proceed 0.7 Miles.

Turn left onto Currier Rd. opposite Indian Rock Road and the sign for Indian Rock Village. Proceed 0.4 miles.

As Currier Rd curves to the left just past 35 and 36 Currier Rd turn right into the dirt entrance to the parking lot for the Heritage Trail in front of the rocks.  The picket fence is part of 36 Currier Rd.
item.why: I'm a new member and would love to meet the people and their four legged pals somewhere close to Manchester or just outside of the city. Are there any dog parks around Manchester?

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Lets meet new members close to manchester
